Attribute.name: description
Attribute.value: Template for submitting a key retrieval or key recovery request

Attribute.name: passphrase
Attribute.value: Passphrase to encrypt the secret with/Passphrase for the PKCS12 file returned

Attribute.name: certificate
Attribute.value: Base64 certificate used for recovering the key.

Attribute.name: sessionWrappedPassphrase
Attribute.value: Base64 encoded session key wrapped passphrase

Attribute.name: transWrappedSessionKey
Attribute.value: Base64 encoded transport key wrapped session key
